00014 #ifndef SQL_STRINGSTREAM_H
00015 #define SQL_STRINGSTREAM_H
00016 
00017 #include "MC2String.h"
00018 
00019 #include <sstream>
00020 #include <iosfwd>
00021 
00022 namespace SQL {
00023 
00041 class StringStream: private std::stringstream {
00042 public:
00043    StringStream() { }
00044 
00046    template <typename T>
00047    inline StringStream& operator << ( const T& value ) {
00048       static_cast< std::stringstream& >( *this ) << value;
00049       return *this;
00050    }
00051 
00053    MC2String str() const {
00054       return std::stringstream::str();
00055    }
00056 };
00057 
00059 template <>
00060 inline StringStream& StringStream::
00061 operator << <MC2String>( const MC2String& value ) {
00062    static_cast< std::stringstream& >( *this ) << "'" << value << "'";
00063    return *this;
00064 }
00065 
00066 template <>
00067 inline StringStream& StringStream::
00068 operator << <uint8>( const uint8& value ) {
00069    static_cast< std::stringstream& >( *this ) << static_cast<uint32>( value );
00070    return *this;
00071 }
00072 
00073 } // SQL
00074 
00079 std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& ostr, const SQL::StringStream& sql );
00080 
00081 #endif // SQL_STRINGSTREAM_H
